DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine in children with persistent AR the effect of the topically applied beclomethasone in comparison with cetirizine on nasal patency evaluated by acoustic rhinometry and subjective nasal symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Nebulized Beclometasone Dipropionate Improves Nasal Patency in Children With Allergic Rhinitis
